Let‚Äôs go! üèõÔ∏èüíöüëè Today‚Äôs historic $20B GGRF announcement marks a significant milestone in our mission to scale climate technologies in a way that puts people first. With this once-in-a-generation, catalytic financing program, America is investing in itself in a big way ‚Äî by accelerating climate solutions that deliver deep community impact and mobilizing much-needed funding to fill the scale gap. We are beyond energized by the US Environmental Protection Agency (EPA)'s announcement that it will award $20B of the $27B GGRF program to our partners and collaborators at the Coalition for Green Capital, Climate United, Justice Climate Fund and Power Forward Communities. Our team has spent the last year working day-in and day-out with these partners to design and build a strategy that centers innovation and equity, with solutions that reduce emissions, build economic opportunity and support healthy neighborhoods. When we started Elemental over 14 years ago, we couldn‚Äôt have imagined we would be building for this kind of moment, with this kind of impact. But with an expansive growing national pipeline of 300+ projects and a decade-plus track record executing community-centered investments, we are ready to deliver. üõ†Ô∏èüå± Learn more: https://lnkd.in/geGxZFUW
